name: VOID (itch) (rafsterrr)
description:
VOID

Play as a black hole in space, with 10 seconds left until you die.

Float around space, scavenging for stars you can absorb in order to increase your time left to live. Dodge lasers from turrets, and collect power ups to boost your chance of survival. How long will you survive?

gameplay

VOID makes you juggle multiple tasks all at once, whether you need to be collecting stars, dodging bullets, using power ups, destroying turrets, and making sure you have enough time to spare.

This game was made for the Mini Jam 130, which is a 3-day game jam based on the limitation of 10 seconds.

day 1
